title: Stedsm
author: Stedsm
content: Hey TryNinja, your bot shows that I got merited by Satoshi saying that he's back on the forum.TBH, I didn't ask about the merits but Satoshi, where is he? Â Haha, btw Happy April Fools Day everyone

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Yeah, I knew it was a hoax the moment I saw it.You should really check out my Bitcointalk Captcha Solver course which is coming out soon - it works really well on desktop.

comments.author: pawanjain
comments.body: I didn't even fell for it because1. I knew it was April fools day.2. The format of the text was broken. That's not how we get the message usually.So it was kinda easy to find out it's a prank from @TryNinja . Good efforts though.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Happy new month, everyone (April fool). I saw it and was not moved by it because I know that's not how a real merit notification looks. TryNinja did some command reconfiguration that enabled the bot to send this message. Lol, you really got some people.Â I knew the notification was not real; it was just the bot messing now.But it's easy to differentiate ðŸ¤”
